QuestData.Title: Welcome!
QuestData.Description: Welcome to the World of Warcraft!$B$BAs special thanks for purchasing the World of Warcraft Collector's Edition, turn in this gift voucher to Claire Willower in Brill. You'll then be given a gift: a little companion to join you on your quest for adventure and glory.$B$BThanks again, and enjoy your stay in the World of Warcraft!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Brill Gift Voucher to Claire Willower in Brill.
QuestData.CompletionText: Greetings! It is a pleasure to meet you!$B$BI see you have a special voucher. Give it to me and I will offer you something in exchange.
QuestData.RewardText: You are indeed a special hero, $N. We welcome you to the world of Azeroth, and offer you one of these unique gifts!
